title: A Proper Villain
description: The Sweet Fist had always been a joke. A villain with no superpowers, he was merely a guy with some martial arts moves that dressed up in a costume with a candy theme. He was an embarrassment to the supervillain community.But now, released after spending twenty years in prison, Victor Volkov, aka the Sweet Fist, has got himself a System, a symbiotic inter-dimensional being that thrives through its Host’s success. The System has informed him he has children and even some grandchildren. In exchange for new powers and hidden knowledge, the System wants the villain to reunite with his family. Only two problems.Number one: How is a bad guy supposed to reunite with a family he never knew existed?Problem number two? The System’s method of motivation: Victor’s failure to succeed will mean his death.
author: Roy Lim
